title: Wrangler Authentics Men's Classic Carpenter Jean
description: UTILITY STORAGE. Built with (2) slash pockets, (2) back pockets, (2) tool pockets on the right leg, and (1) hammer loop on the left, these carpenter jeans are made to keep your tools easily accessible while working on the job or in the workshop.
RELAXED FIT. Constructed with your comfort in mind, these carpenter pants are made with a relaxed seat and thigh and sit at the natural waistline.
CLASSIC CARPENTER STYLE. Great for any woodworker or craftsman, this classic carpenter pant is designed in an authentic carpenter style and durable materials that keep you comfortable and protected.
ALL DAY COMFORT. These carpenter jeans are made with stretch fabric that keep you comfortable all day and built to last through any task.
HEAVY DUTY HARDWARE. Finished with a brass zipper fly and metal button closure, these work pants are made with durable rivet reinforcements at the pocket stress points.

With classic carpenter details, the Wrangler Authentic Men's Classic Carpenter pant is sure to be your favorite, whether if you are working on the job or causally going out for the day. Featuring a soft yet durable cotton polyester blend, this jean offers lasting comfort and functionality throughout your day. Design for work, these jeans feature 2 large front and back pockets, 1 rule pocket and 1 hammer loop, as they provide you with a place for all your tools and belongings.
